level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-158
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-158, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1801.04.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-141
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-141, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1801.04.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x) through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001."
